persName.note: J. Cole is a rapper and music producer who has continuously used his influence to talk about social issues through his lyricism and online presence.
Michael Brown was an unarmed black teenager who was shot and killed on August 9, 2014 by Darren Wilson in Ferguson, Missouri.
Dorian Johnson was Michael Brown's best friend who was with him prior to the fatal shooting.
Darren Wilson is the former police officer who shot and killed Michael Brown.

[Eyewitness account from Dorian Johnson:]
So now it was like the officer Darren Wilson is pulling him inside the car and he's
trying to pull away. At no time the officer said that he was going
to do anything until he pulled out his weapon. His weapon was
drawn and he said, "I'll shoot you" or, "I'm going to shoot" and in
the same moment, the first shot went off. We looked down and he
was shot and there was blood coming from him. Then we took off
running

As we Dorian Johnson and Michael Brown took off running I ducked and hid for my life, because I was
fearing for my life. I hid behind the first car I saw. My friend, Michael Brown he
kept running, and he told me to keep running because he feared
for me too. So as he was running the officer was trying to get out
of the car, and once he got out the car he pursued my friend but
his weapon was drawn. Now he didn't see any weapon drawn at
him or anything like that, us going for no weapon. His weapon was
already drawn when he got out the car. He shot again, and once
